meanings.sent1: The maturations of the caterpillar into a butterfly amazed the children.
meanings.sent2: The maturations of the seeds into plants brought joy to the gardener.
meanings.sent3: The maturations of the cheese in the fridge made it taste delicious.
meanings.sent4: The maturations of the friendship over the years deepened their bond.
meanings.sent5: The maturations of the wine in the cellar enhanced its flavor.

meanings.definition: The act or process of maturing.
meanings.sent1: Each maturations in life teaches us valuable lessons.
meanings.sent2: The maturations of the fruit on the tree signaled the start of autumn.
meanings.sent3: The maturations of the dough in the oven filled the kitchen with a delightful aroma.
meanings.sent4: The maturations of the plan brought it to fruition.
meanings.sent5: The maturations of the student's skills impressed the teacher.

meanings.sent1: His maturations were evident in his responsible behavior.
